data.resultNames: Project ID, Enabled, Repo URL, Repo Instructions
data.requestSQL:
SELECT group_id, enabled, url_primary, instructions_public
FROM sf0314.external_tool_links

SELECT group_id, license
FROM sf0314.groups
WHERE group_id < 100

SELECT group_id, preferred_support_type, preferred_support_resource
FROM sf0314.groups
WHERE preferred_support_type = 6 AND group_id < 100

SELECT group_id, use_wiki
FROM sf0314.groups
WHERE group_id < 100

SELECT group_id, use_wiki, use_forum
FROM sf0314.groups
WHERE group_id < 100

data.indicatorDescription: Transparency of contributions and acceptance process
data.requestSQL:
SELECT g.group_id, g.use_wiki, agl.is_public, agl.submit_instructions, agl.browse_instructions
FROM sf0314.groups g, sf0314.artifact_group_list agl
WHERE g.group_id = agl.group_id
AND g.group_id < 100

data.indicatorDescription: Transparency of contributors to source code
data.requestSQL:
SELECT g.group_id, u.user_id
FROM sf0314.groups g, sf0314.users u, sf0314.project_history ph, sf0314.project_task pt, sf0314.project_group_list pgl
WHERE ph.project_task_id = pt.project_task_id
AND pt.group_project_id = pgl.group_project_id
AND g.group_id = pgl.group_id
AND ph.mod_by = u.user_id
AND g.group_id < 100

SELECT fp.group_id, MAX(fr.name)
FROM sf0314.frs_package fp, sf0314.frs_release fr, sf0314.frs_status fs
WHERE fp.package_id = fr.package_id
AND fp.group_id < 100
GROUP BY fp.group_id

SELECT group_id, register_time
FROM sf0314.groups
WHERE 1=1 LIMIT 100000

SELECT group_id, COUNT(user_id)
FROM sf0314.user_group
WHERE grantcvs = 1
AND group_id < 100
GROUP BY group_id

data.indicatorDescription: Total number of developers per project
data.requestSQL: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sf0314.user_group WHERE group_id = 19
